subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz and Manny Ramírez combined to reach base safely in all 10 of their plate appearances as the Red Sox defeated C. C. Sabathia and the Cleveland Indians Friday.
snippet: David Ortiz and Manny Ramírez combined to reach base safely in all 10 of their plate appearances as the Red Sox defeated C. C. Sabathia and the Cleveland Indians Friday.
